trans-unit.source: Represents a grammar rule.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma regra de gramática.

trans-unit.source: Use the SrgsRule class to create a new rule at run time or to modify a rule in an existing grammar stream or file at run time.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a classe de SrgsRule para criar uma nova regra em tempo de execução ou modificar uma regra num fluxo de gramática existente ou ficheiro em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The words and phrases specified by SrgsRule objects in grammars defined by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instances limit the spoken input that the recognizer must be able to identify.
trans-unit.target: As palavras e expressões especificados por objetos SrgsRule gramáticas definidos pelo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>instâncias limitam a entrada de ditas o reconhecedor deve ser capaz de identificar.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: An SrgsRule object specifies the sequence in which words and phrases must be spoken by ordering the objects that contain them.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de SrgsRule Especifica a sequência na qual devem ser ditas por ordenar os objetos que contêm palavras e expressões diferentes.

trans-unit.source: Words and phrases within a rule are represented by objects such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> elements.
trans-unit.target: Palavras e expressões dentro de uma regra são representados por objetos, tais como <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>elementos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> property to access the collection of child objects that an SrgsRule object contains.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A>propriedade para aceder à coleção de objetos subordinados que contenha um objeto de SrgsRule.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can determine whether an SrgsRule can be specified in a rule reference from a rule in an external grammar by setting its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Scope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode determinar se um SrgsRule pode ser especificada numa referência de regra de uma regra na gramática externa definindo a respetiva <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Scope%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Scope%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not legal to define an SrgsRule that is empty or that contains only white space.
trans-unit.target: Não é válido para definir um SrgsRule que está vazio ou que contém apenas espaços em branco.

trans-unit.source: This class represents the `rule` element that is defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: Esta classe representa o `rule` elemento que está definido a Consortium World Wide Web (W3C) [especificação de gramática de reconhecimento de voz (SRGS) versão 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).

trans-unit.source: For information about the SRGS `rule` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [rule Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/da67b4aa-0545-426a-a02f-1417b968021e).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o SRGS `rule` elemento e obter detalhes sobre o suporte por System.Speech, consulte [regra elemento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/da67b4aa-0545-426a-a02f-1417b968021e).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"></xref> class and specifies the identifier for the rule.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"> </xref> classe e especifica o identificador da regra.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da regra.

trans-unit.source: id is .
trans-unit.target: idis .

trans-unit.source: id is empty.
trans-unit.target: idestá vazio.

trans-unit.source: id is not a proper rule identifier.
trans-unit.target: idNão é um identificador de regra adequada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"></xref> class from an array of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"> </xref> classe a partir de uma matriz de <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da regra.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"> </xref> elementos.

trans-unit.source: id is .
trans-unit.target: idis .

trans-unit.source: elements is .
trans-unit.target: elementsis .

trans-unit.source: id is empty.
trans-unit.target: idestá vazio.

trans-unit.source: id is not a proper rule identifier.
trans-unit.target: idNão é um identificador de regra adequada.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref> to an <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"> </xref> para um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Typical additions to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object include <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> objects that specify what speakers can say.
trans-unit.target: Adições típicas para um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objeto incluem <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>objetos que especificam o que pode indicar speakers.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: A valid rule element must contain at least one piece of recognizable text or one rule reference.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento de regra válida tem de conter pelo menos um fragmento de texto reconhecível ou uma referência de regra.

trans-unit.source: See [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [criar gramáticas utilizando SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object may also contain <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag> objects that add semantic values and semantic keys to the rule.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objeto também poderão conter <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>objetos que adicione semânticos valores e chaves de semânticos para a regra.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engine will return the semantic information, as well as the recognized phrase, when it recognizes the phrase.
trans-unit.target: O motor de reconhecimento de voz irá devolver as informações de semânticos, bem como o frase reconhecido, quando reconhece-o frase de acesso.

trans-unit.source: See [Semantic Interpretation Markup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/2e115391-73b3-4666-8fd1-540c529de3b0) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [Markup de interpretação semântica](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/2e115391-73b3-4666-8fd1-540c529de3b0) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: An object that inherits from <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref> and specifies what can be recognized.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que herda de <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"> </xref> e especifica o que pode ser reconhecido.

trans-unit.source: element is .
trans-unit.target: elementis .

trans-unit.source: This property is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é atualmente suportada.

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não suportada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The elements in an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object can consist of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag> objects.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos num <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objeto pode consistir <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>objetos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: The collection of elements in the rule.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos na regra.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identifier for the rule.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o identificador da regra.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the rule.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da regra.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Id to an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: É efetuada uma tentativa de definir o Id para um valor inválido.

trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é atualmente suportada.

trans-unit.target: Não suportada.

trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é atualmente suportada.

trans-unit.target: Não suportada.

trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é atualmente suportada.

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não suportada.

trans-unit.source: This property is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é atualmente suportada.

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não suportada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a rule can be activated for recognition and when the rule can be referenced by other rules.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se uma regra pode ser activada para reconhecimento e quando a regra pode ser referenciada por outras regras.

trans-unit.source: The default value for scope is `Private`.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido para o âmbito é `Private`.

trans-unit.source: A private rule can only be activated for recognition by a rule reference from the root rule in its containing grammar or from another rule that is referenced from the root rule.
trans-unit.target: Uma regra privada só pode ser ativada para reconhecimento por uma referência de regra a partir da regra de raiz no respetiva contentor gramática ou de outra regra que é referenciada a partir da regra de raiz.

trans-unit.source: A private rule cannot be referenced by an external grammar, unless the private rule is declared as the root rule of its containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: Uma regra privada não pode ser referenciada por uma gramática externa, a menos que a regra privada está declarada como a regra de raiz do respetiva contentor gramática.

trans-unit.source: If its scope is set to `Public`, an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object can be activated for recognition by a reference from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> object in the containing grammar or from a rule in an external grammar.
trans-unit.target: Se o seu âmbito está definido como `Public`, um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objeto pode ser ativado para reconhecimento por uma referência de um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>objeto a gramática contentor ou de uma regra na gramática externa.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: A value the sets the scope for the rule.
trans-unit.target: Os conjuntos de valor de um, o âmbito da regra.

trans-unit.source: This property is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é atualmente suportada.

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não suportada.
